taxon_identification.other_info_on_name: [Greek pter- , winged, gyne , female, and andros , male, presumably alluding to lateral position of gametoecia]

bio:treatment.description: Plants in pendent to prostrate mats, green to yellow-green. Stems freely and irregularly branched; paraphyllia absent or few. Leaves erect, somewhat falcate to homomallous, imbricate, oblong-elliptic; margins narrowly reflexed proximally, erect and serrulate distally; apex obtuse to acute; costa double, short, narrow; alar cells weakly differentiated; laminal cells oblong-rhombic, prorulose abaxially, walls generally thick. Capsule erect, cylindric, symmetric.
North America, West Indies, Central America, Europe, Asia.
